bio: No matter how lazy you are, you'll work fast when Papa Bolt's watching. His anger is SCAAAAARY!

soultimate.name: A Father's Scorn
soultimate.description: Lightning strikes to deal foes lots of damage.

skill.effect: Atk ↑ when attacked, 2% ↑ per hit, lasts till death.
skill.name: That All You Got?

name: Papa Bolt
